name: Youssef
text: I would start with the staff They are all nice and helpful to full extent, Bilal made my stay amazing with the chats we had each time, and not forgetting the security guard who was a charming person The view is outstanding, couldn't ask for better The whole place is super clean I highly recommend staying there and this is not going to be my last time here inshallah

name: Anass
text: The location, the view, the breakfast in the garden and most importantly the closed community which makes it very calm even the beach, by the way enjoy a dip in the water first thing in the morning or late before the sunset- just magical

name: Youssef
text: Amazing view on the Mediterranean sea, very kind personel, good connexion with all surrounding centres and cities

name: Mohamed
text: Clean room, very comfortable bed, and very beautiful view, the service is really great

name: Radi
text: The rooms in Lyla hotel have an excellant view, and quick access to the beach. The hotel staff are very genuine and helpful.

name: Ochfy
text: Location is just perfect. 2 min walking to the beach. Breakfast is good. Staff are very friendly and nice.

name: Mohammed
text: It was close to the seaside and the centre of Fnidq and also not too far from sebtha border

name: Andrea
text: The hotel is located on a wonderful beach we would say the most beautiful so far for us in Morocco. The rooms have all sea views due to the round construction and on the balcony you can watch sunrise and sunset over the sea. The beach is only a few minutes walk away. There you can rent beach chairs with umbrellas. M'Diq is about 10 minutes away by car but there is often too much traffic (then the drive takes about 20 minutes). There we were always in the evening: here you can eat well. The breakfast in the Lydia Resort is expandable.... Otherwise: Wonderful beach, comfortable bed, very clean hotel, extremely friendly and helpful staff, ypu should bring a car to reach M'diq faster

name: Mansoor
text: The staff were welcoming and helpful
